item.description:
A Quaint Restaurant & Bar in Concord, MA with Live Music in a Historical Building...
Main Streets is an old-world meeting place with brick walls and wood floors that will transport you back in time. It is a "Cheers" sort of atmosphere for the townspeople and a great find for all others. Live music plays from 7 pm - 10pm for your entertainment while dining. Playing this evening will be the MetroWest Jazz Project. Dinners range from appetizers and pub food to full course dinners, $8-22.
http://www.mainstreet...

Please RSVP by 5/19 and I will make a reservation.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Dinner and Jazz - Main Streets Market & Cafe
